City: Steigenberger Minerva Nile Cruise - Every Thursday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Monday From Aswan for 03 Nights (Cruise) (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Steigenberger Minerva Nile Cruise - Every Thursday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Monday From Aswan for 03 Nights
Positive Review:
- [x] We had a wonderful time on our 3 night Nile cruise from Aswan to Luxor and it really exceeded our expectations. Our rooms were spacious and comfortable, the staff were friendly and very helpful and the food was delicious varied and plentiful. We had our own private guide and driver Salah and Mahmoud from Egypt Tailor Made who took us to all the sites Temple of Philae, KomOmbo, and Edfu, Karnak and Luxor and the Valley of the Kings etc. and a sail in a felluca at Aswan. We visited Abu Simbel the day before joining the cruise and stayed the night there which I definitely recommend, we visited in the afternoon without all the day tours so it was very quiet and we saw the Sound and Light show in the evening so had a second look at the temple exterior. It was a magical experience. 
Our cruise wa
There is a tip box in reception for all the many staff who make this memorable, the suggested tip from previous reviews is 10 usd per traveler per day so for 5 of us and 3 days was 150 usd but was so happy with everything we did 200 usd. We also tipped a little Egyptian money to our waiter, the bag carriers and the guy who made beautiful and hilarious sculptures with our towels. 
I do think travelling from Aswan to Luxor was better for our group we loved finishing with the Karnak and Luxor Temples and the Valley of the Kings and more economical being 3 nights.

City: M/S Nephtis Nile Cruise (Cruise), Luxor (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
IT's a SCAM. The GTS Cairo Group own or lease rooms on several cruise ships sailing on the Nile. We had booked a 3-persons room with balcony on M/S Nephtis Nile Cruise (specifice because of the balcony and 3-person room 28m2 which not many Nile cruises offer).
We were picked up in Luxsor Airport by a staff member of GTS. He was in a hurry getting us out of the airport and keept mention the name Royal Ruby. We told him that we had booked cruise on Nephtis. He looked very confused and called the his office. He informed us that Nephtis wasn't sailing and we had been "upgraded" to 5* ship Royal Ruby WITHOUT our KNOWLEDGE or ACCEPT.
Arriving on the ship his focuse was getting paid CASH the amount we had accepted booking our room at Nephtis BEFORE we were showed our new room.
Once the payment was made we were taken to our room. It was ONE 2-pers room 21m2 with no balcony (only a sliding window) and an extra bed squeezed in. We immidiatly got hold of the GTS man and complained about the room size, the missing balcony. He called the GTS office and I got a lady (Rasha) on the phone who couldn't/wouldn't understand/see the issue. We had been "upgraded" to a 5* ship and were therefore was NOT entiteled to compentation or reimbursment of the price difference (usd 714,-) between the Nephtis and Royal Ruby.
During our 4 night/5 day stay we tried several time to get in contact with someone on the ship (no one had any authorit) and when we finaly got in contact with GTS Office they insisted that we was NOT entiteled to compensation or reimbursment as 3 persons CAN NOT book/stay in a 2-pers room and we therefor would be charged for 2X 2-pers rooms though we ONLY had ONE 2-person room where we stayed the full cruise.
Negative Review:
Looking a reviews for Nephtis Nile Cruise at Booking.com there only a few saying almost nothing. On other sites we have found that we're not the only ones who had been "upgraded" to other 5* ships (Rammes 2 - Samirames 1 etc) 
I starting to doubt that M/S Nephtis exist at all.
The service and food on board Royal Ruby was awfull. Very few of the cruise staff speak english, the entertainment at night was non existing and the Food was the same every day/night.

City: Jaz Crown Prince Nile Cruise - Every Monday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Friday From Aswan for 03 Nights (Cruise) (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Jaz Crown Prince Nile Cruise - Every Monday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Friday From Aswan for 03 Nights
Positive Review: It was a very enjoyable experience. The crew was amazing and no request went unfulfilled. Everything was done with a smile and sincere warmth. Meals were served buffet style and were wonderful. So many choices! Also included was a carving station, fresh pasta station and an egg/omelette/crepe station. Drinks during lunch and dinner were not included, but very reasonably priced. We opted to purchase the optional tour package at $250 a piece. Great decision, as there were only two other clients and we were provided admission, transportation and a professional guide during our visits to all the historic sites. It was well worth it!
Negative Review: The Crown Prince was relocated to dockage 10km from the center of Luxor the week prior to our arrival and was difficult to locate. Our driver had to ask directions to find it. Overall the Crown Prince is a good ship, however it is tired and needs major work. The tile in our bathroom was missing grout, sealant was missing in the shower and the water temperature in the shower continuously changed while showering. There are few electrical outlets in the room and I was forced to disconnect a light to set up a charging station for our cell phones. At one point, the ship also developed engine trouble and we ended up not stopping at Kom Ombo, as we arrived there after the site had closed. This was disappointing! I realized that all of the Nile cruise ships were being run 24/7, with no down time. This again attests to phenomenal work by the crew to make the cruise run as smoothly as it did. Overall, it was still a good experience.

City: Iberotel Crown Empress Nile Cruise - Every Monday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Friday From Aswan for 03 Nights (Cruise) (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Iberotel Crown Empress Nile Cruise - Every Monday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Friday From Aswan for 03 Nights
Positive Review:
The friendliness of the staff is really making the whole experience worthwhile. We did not book the excursion package as this was very expensive in comparison with the actual cost. We made all our excursions on our own and managed fine at less than 3rd of the price/person.
The international atmosphere on board was very nice and allthough the itinerary was with 'Egyptian' times, we enjoyed the actual cruising very much. It is very relaxing to sit on deck (trying to stay out of direct sun) and read a book about the old Egyptian civilization and seeing the landscape go back that is described in the same book.... Just wonderful.
Negative Review:
Sundeck should also have section with chaise longs in a constant shadow so that people don't have to move and look for that one place without direct sun!! 
What I definately not like is the fact that I requested a 'quiet' room and I get the room right under the dance floor?!! 
Most of the time we are docked between other boats which means we hardly ever can leave our curtains open en enjoy the view. Being in our room means ALWAYS sitting in artificial light. 
Also pictures on booking.com definately not match the reality. 'What's wrong with the picture' is definately a question we can ask ourselves. 
Location in Luxor is very misleading. Far away from the center and the front of the Luxor Temple!!

City: Iberotel Crown Empress Nile Cruise - Every Monday from Luxor for 07 & 04 Nights - Every Friday From Aswan for 03 Nights (Cruise) (Egypt) deals

Negative Review: It took them 3 days to answer a question through bookings prior to check in. Then they didn't give us the correct name of the dock that the boat was leaving from, or any check-in instructions. The driver got lost, they didn't answer the phone, it was really stressful. There are no tea/coffee-making facilities in the room, and the decor is a bit dated. They changed dinner times on a whim and the seemed to decide on the day what the program was.

City: Casa Cook El Gouna - Adults Only (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Casa Cook El Gouna - Adults Only
Positive Review: We stayed here for 7 nights to escape the Belgian winter and soak up some sun! El Gouna offers plenty of activities (golf, tennis, padel, karting, snorkling) but the large pool at the hotel is so inviting we basically chilled there every day with the occasional kitesurfing and volleybal session - there's a volleybal court and Duotone kite center on site. The staff is super nice, fun and engaging - we knew them by name after two days. There's magazines, chess, checkers and backgammon boards at the pool and a guy handing out shishas. The crowd is quite young, mostly 30/35 year old couples. The food is the best we've had in Egypt. The spa is also great, has its own pool, sauna and steam room. Highly recommend, will be back!
Negative Review: Honestly can't think of many negative points... The Duotone center is expensive they charge 150 euro for one day of rental but it goes down as you book more days. Great service though, they pump your kite, set the lines and help launching. The hotel was built in 2019 so some aspects of the interior might use a little repainting or renovation but don't think most people would notice.

Positive Review: Amazing swimming pools, Spacious room and bathroom. Very nice lounge bar. Very good choice of foods. Staff very friendly. Fun activities for small children. Lots of sunbeds, loungers by the pools.
Negative Review:
Very limited choice of Alcoholic drinks- one red wine, one white wine and one beer (all very average quality) but they did have usual spirits and juices. Our room was in the south west building (room balcony facing North East) so never got any sunlight!
Resort is also very big so feels less cozy (like massive swimming pools with apartment buildings on opposite sides). During our stay maintenance work was going on like painting in our corridors and lobby areas with resultant paint dust!
Evening entertainment average! Bookable “Wow restaurant” not worth it for vegetarians as only one set menu everyday! Overall just felt like a conveyor belt of tourists coming and going.

Positive Review: The resort was absolutely incredible. The staff were so incredibly nice and always took care of us and got us anything we needed. The food was delicious and there was an amazing variety in food. We celebrated two birthdays and they helped us celebrate both of them by bringing cake and brought a band to sing for us, it was genuinely so nice. The live shows and activities were also very good and entertainment team made it interactive and fun. We would like to specifically thank Mohammed Atef from the Golden lounge he was genuinely the most helpful and kindest person, he was constantly bringing us food and going above and beyond his main job, thank you so much Mohammed for taking care of us! We would also like to thank Ahmad Rafie for cleaning the rooms, much better than any other hotel we’ve stayed at. Abdul Aziz Mohamed, Ahmed Karam, Ali Eissa, Ahmed Mohamed, and Sayed Ibrahim, all from reception were so helpful they checked us in early, got the rooms we wanted, held all our deliveries at reception and delivered them to our rooms, got us taxis and gave us a lot of insightful information to help us stay safe in Hurghada especially as we were all girls (and helped us avoid any scams), thank you so much to them! In the restaurants Mahmoud Mohamed was very helpful and so were the rest of the staff who constantly brought us drinks and cleared our tables instantly, also Elsayed Nasem who made pizzas was very sweet and the pizzas were incredible! Thank you also to the entertainment team specifically Boda (Abdelrahman), Milana, Tanya and Faris for constantly keeping us entertained!! Finally thank you to Mr Haitham for constantly checking on us even from before the trip, you made us feel very welcome. All the staff were so nice and constantly checking on our safety and happiness and we genuienly wouldn’t have enjoyed the trip without them, thank you so much for an amazing holiday! Would definitely recommend this resort and we will all be coming back in the future :))

City: Pickalbatros Aqua Blu Resort - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
As a family of 4, we recently stayed at Pickalbatros Aqua Blue hotel. We booked a family room which contains 2 separate bedrooms and 1 bathroom. 

Our experience has been a very positive one. The hotel is very clean and perfect for anyone looking to visit Hurghada. The location is very close to the airport which was convenient to get to. It is also
close to other amenities such as the shopping mall, beach, marina etc.

The hotel had 3 buffet restaurants and 1 a’la carte restaurant which offered local and international cuisines. We booked the a’la carte restaurant for our daughters birthday and we were received a beautiful surprise from the waiters who sang a birthday song and gave a cake to her.


The swimming pools were heated which allowed us to enjoy and make use of.

Wifi signal and speed was great in anywhere inside the hotel.

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and made our stay very special
and went out of their way to make us happy, particularly staff members 
Hossam in reception, Nader in housekeeping, Mustafa the restaurant manager who was always ready to help us.

All in all, we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to visit Hurghada. 

We will book the hotel again if we plan to holiday in Hurghada Insha Allah.

City: Palm Royale Resort - Soma Bay (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I had the pleasure of staying at Palm Royal in Soma Bay, for second time and it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm hospitality and exceptional service. The staff were incredibly attentive and always went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

The rooms were spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated, offering stunning views of the Red Sea. The private beach was pristine, and the crystal-clear waters were perfect for snorkeling and other water activities.

The dining options were superb, with a variety of restaurants serving delicious international and local cuisine. Each meal was a culinary delight, and the chefs were accommodating to special dietary needs.

One of the highlights of my stay was the array of activities available. Whether it was lounging by the pool, engaging in water sports, or exploring the nearby attractions, there was always something to do.

Overall, Palm Royal in Soma Bay exceeded all my expectations. It’s the perfect destination for relaxation, adventure, and unparalleled luxury. I can’t wait to return and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable vacation in Egypt.

City: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View (Apartment), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View
Positive Review:
Soma Bay is a stunning coastal resort renowned for its breathtaking natural beauty and luxurious amenities.

We often like to spend our vacations in a hotel in Soma Bay because we love the area. During our recent stay, we decided to extend our trip by one more night, so we booked this apartment as it was much cheaper than staying in the hotel.

I must say, it was an exceptional experience. The apartment was very spacious, immaculately clean, well-maintained, and beautifully furnished with brand new furniture and a well-equipped kitchen, offering all the conveniences one could ask for. It truly felt like a home away from home. We also loved the pool table on the terrace. The location of the apartment was fantastic, with a stunning panoramic view of the sea.

Additionally, we had free access to the “S.CAPE” beach and the heated swimming pool downstairs, which was a wonderful bonus, providing a perfect spot for relaxation and water activities.

Our host, Midu, was incredibly helpful and welcoming, ensuring that our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. He also offered us a transfer to the airport with an SUV for a very affordable price, which we accepted.


Overall, I highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a memorable stay in Soma Bay. It truly exceeded our expectations in every way. We cannot wait to come back! and we will not book a hotel this time we will book this amazing apartment😍.

City: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View (Apartment), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View
Positive Review:
This apartment is one of the best in Soma Bay. It is very spacious, modern, clean, well decorated and has amazing panoramic sea views overlooking the best golf courses in the bay. 
The small details like comfortable mattresses and having chargers next to the beds were great. Also, the outdoor swimming pool is heated so can be used anytime of year. Soma bay is a fantastic location with loads to do and explore - we spent most of our time at the pier which has the best snorkeling location in Soma and is only 5 mins away from the apartment. 
I recommend hiring a golf car for your time here so you can get around easily, make the most of the Bay and explore the area as there are many activities for couples and families. 
Highly recommend, would definitely visit again.

City: Beach Albatros Aqua Park - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I recently stayed at Pickalbatros Beach in Hurghada, and it was an absolutely fantastic experience! From the moment we arrived, the staff was incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring a smooth check-in process.

The resort itself is stunning, with beautifully maintained gardens, pristine pools, and direct access to a breathtaking private beach with crystal-clear waters. The rooms were spacious, spotless, and well-equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.

One of the highlights was the food—the variety and quality were outstanding! The buffet offered delicious options for every meal, and the restaurants provided an amazing dining experience. The animation team did a fantastic job keeping guests entertained with fun activities and live shows in the evenings.

Whether you’re looking to relax by the pool, enjoy water sports, or indulge in great food, this hotel has it all. I highly recommend Pickalbatros Beach for an unforgettable holiday in Hurghada! I’ll definitely be returning!

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
We arrived for a 3 -night-stay at New Year just before UK celebration time and we had to wait at the reception for a long time to be accommodated. However, eventually problem resolved, we received an apartment complimentary, even though we missed the Happy New Year mood after a long flight. After this false start everything went smoothly.
Clean room at a noisy street as the hotel is on the main street, on the other hand, it offers at a walking distance and nice restaurants and shops are easy to visit.
The roof restaurant is quite cosy and the staff would offer you variety of food for breakfast , feel free to ask what you prefer.
The beach is 5 minutes walk is nearby and is one of the best in the town and free for the hotel guests. We enjoyed a fresh juice there and we would visit again.
Altogether, next time for a short convenient stay before starting our snorkeling trip, we would visit Lamera again.
Negative Review: Maybe a kettle and tea and coffee amenities in the room to be provided

Positive Review: Very good value for money, the room was cheap, spacious and clean and staff was nice. The hotel is close to the Marina and in one of the touristy areas.

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I arrived at the hotel, the staff greeted me as if I was meeting friends I hadn't seen for a while. Eman and Fayrouz explained everything about the hotel. I felt respected as a guest and knew I could mention any potential problem which would be solved swiftly. Over the 2 weeks I was there I met the manager Walid and the owner, Mr Mina. The hotel and its guests are in good hands, welcomed and offered great deals with excursions (fabulous at good price), access to beaches, info about well priced restaurants in the area and so on. Ask and you will be heard! I want to thank Gamel also for his help and the night staff who is amazing.
My room was comfortable, good mattress, little balcony, good mirror. 
The breakfast is served from 7am to 12 on the top floor, where you can sit on individual balconies, overlooking the skyline of downtown and the radiant sky. The serving is simple and healthy; they manage to add a change daily, there is a hot item included every day, never the same. The friendliness of the service is the best, even if do not speak Arabic.
I was impressed by the collegial teamwork amongst every worker at Lamera, nothing is too difficult to solve for them. Thank you all for great management and respect for who comes through the door!
Negative Review: The bathroom could do with 2 more hooks

Negative Review: Potentially noisy rooms, breakfast not worth the money (slow, not very tasty)

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
The location is best
You must accept typical street noises which is pleasant to some degree
Inefficient AC, please come in the wintertime
There is only very small table
Doors let many noises, it is best when you book outside hot season as you will live far away from elevator

As a summary: good when it is 25C, when there are few tourists, for budget and frequent touring through marina. For travellers as main base for exploration,
Negative Review:
The rooms were NOT cleaned daily by default as in other budget hotels
The breakfast is not for european taste in geneal, what is worse the service is very slow - not worth it
Certain equipment is missing: safe bolted to the back of bookshelf instead of wall etc
No shelf for soap in the shower, and the curtain too short means lots of water sprinkles around
The table is very small, not for reading, not for laptop, not for 2 people
ELEVATOR IS DANGEROUS always check if it is BEHIND the door when you open it!

Compared to PalmInn: cleaning frequency was worse, sound proofing worse, table worse, bathroom equipment vey slightly worse, safety much worse (elevator). I advise Lamera for adults, PalmInn for families

City: Casa Cook El Gouna - Adults Only (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Casa Cook El Gouna - Adults Only
Positive Review: We stayed here for 7 nights to escape the Belgian winter and soak up some sun! El Gouna offers plenty of activities (golf, tennis, padel, karting, snorkling) but the large pool at the hotel is so inviting we basically chilled there every day with the occasional kitesurfing and volleybal session - there's a volleybal court and Duotone kite center on site. The staff is super nice, fun and engaging - we knew them by name after two days. There's magazines, chess, checkers and backgammon boards at the pool and a guy handing out shishas. The crowd is quite young, mostly 30/35 year old couples. The food is the best we've had in Egypt. The spa is also great, has its own pool, sauna and steam room. Highly recommend, will be back!
Negative Review: Honestly can't think of many negative points... The Duotone center is expensive they charge 150 euro for one day of rental but it goes down as you book more days. Great service though, they pump your kite, set the lines and help launching. The hotel was built in 2019 so some aspects of the interior might use a little repainting or renovation but don't think most people would notice.

Positive Review: Amazing swimming pools, Spacious room and bathroom. Very nice lounge bar. Very good choice of foods. Staff very friendly. Fun activities for small children. Lots of sunbeds, loungers by the pools.
Negative Review:
Very limited choice of Alcoholic drinks- one red wine, one white wine and one beer (all very average quality) but they did have usual spirits and juices. Our room was in the south west building (room balcony facing North East) so never got any sunlight!
Resort is also very big so feels less cozy (like massive swimming pools with apartment buildings on opposite sides). During our stay maintenance work was going on like painting in our corridors and lobby areas with resultant paint dust!
Evening entertainment average! Bookable “Wow restaurant” not worth it for vegetarians as only one set menu everyday! Overall just felt like a conveyor belt of tourists coming and going.

City: Pickalbatros Blu Spa Resort - Adults Friendly 16 Years Plus- Ultra All-Inclusive (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Pickalbatros Blu Spa Resort - Adults Friendly 16 Years Plus- Ultra All-Inclusive
Positive Review: The resort was absolutely incredible. The staff were so incredibly nice and always took care of us and got us anything we needed. The food was delicious and there was an amazing variety in food. We celebrated two birthdays and they helped us celebrate both of them by bringing cake and brought a band to sing for us, it was genuinely so nice. The live shows and activities were also very good and entertainment team made it interactive and fun. We would like to specifically thank Mohammed Atef from the Golden lounge he was genuinely the most helpful and kindest person, he was constantly bringing us food and going above and beyond his main job, thank you so much Mohammed for taking care of us! We would also like to thank Ahmad Rafie for cleaning the rooms, much better than any other hotel we’ve stayed at. Abdul Aziz Mohamed, Ahmed Karam, Ali Eissa, Ahmed Mohamed, and Sayed Ibrahim, all from reception were so helpful they checked us in early, got the rooms we wanted, held all our deliveries at reception and delivered them to our rooms, got us taxis and gave us a lot of insightful information to help us stay safe in Hurghada especially as we were all girls (and helped us avoid any scams), thank you so much to them! In the restaurants Mahmoud Mohamed was very helpful and so were the rest of the staff who constantly brought us drinks and cleared our tables instantly, also Elsayed Nasem who made pizzas was very sweet and the pizzas were incredible! Thank you also to the entertainment team specifically Boda (Abdelrahman), Milana, Tanya and Faris for constantly keeping us entertained!! Finally thank you to Mr Haitham for constantly checking on us even from before the trip, you made us feel very welcome. All the staff were so nice and constantly checking on our safety and happiness and we genuienly wouldn’t have enjoyed the trip without them, thank you so much for an amazing holiday! Would definitely recommend this resort and we will all be coming back in the future :))
Negative Review: If there was a fresca man on the beach it would be quite a nice addition!

City: Pickalbatros Aqua Blu Resort - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
As a family of 4, we recently stayed at Pickalbatros Aqua Blue hotel. We booked a family room which contains 2 separate bedrooms and 1 bathroom. 

Our experience has been a very positive one. The hotel is very clean and perfect for anyone looking to visit Hurghada. The location is very close to the airport which was convenient to get to. It is also
close to other amenities such as the shopping mall, beach, marina etc.

The hotel had 3 buffet restaurants and 1 a’la carte restaurant which offered local and international cuisines. We booked the a’la carte restaurant for our daughters birthday and we were received a beautiful surprise from the waiters who sang a birthday song and gave a cake to her.


The swimming pools were heated which allowed us to enjoy and make use of.

Wifi signal and speed was great in anywhere inside the hotel.

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and made our stay very special
and went out of their way to make us happy, particularly staff members 
Hossam in reception, Nader in housekeeping, Mustafa the restaurant manager who was always ready to help us.

All in all, we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to visit Hurghada. 

We will book the hotel again if we plan to holiday in Hurghada Insha Allah.

City: Palm Royale Resort - Soma Bay (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I had the pleasure of staying at Palm Royal in Soma Bay, for second time and it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm hospitality and exceptional service. The staff were incredibly attentive and always went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

The rooms were spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated, offering stunning views of the Red Sea. The private beach was pristine, and the crystal-clear waters were perfect for snorkeling and other water activities.

The dining options were superb, with a variety of restaurants serving delicious international and local cuisine. Each meal was a culinary delight, and the chefs were accommodating to special dietary needs.

One of the highlights of my stay was the array of activities available. Whether it was lounging by the pool, engaging in water sports, or exploring the nearby attractions, there was always something to do.

Overall, Palm Royal in Soma Bay exceeded all my expectations. It’s the perfect destination for relaxation, adventure, and unparalleled luxury. I can’t wait to return and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable vacation in Egypt.

City: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View (Apartment), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View
Positive Review:
Soma Bay is a stunning coastal resort renowned for its breathtaking natural beauty and luxurious amenities.

We often like to spend our vacations in a hotel in Soma Bay because we love the area. During our recent stay, we decided to extend our trip by one more night, so we booked this apartment as it was much cheaper than staying in the hotel.

I must say, it was an exceptional experience. The apartment was very spacious, immaculately clean, well-maintained, and beautifully furnished with brand new furniture and a well-equipped kitchen, offering all the conveniences one could ask for. It truly felt like a home away from home. We also loved the pool table on the terrace. The location of the apartment was fantastic, with a stunning panoramic view of the sea.

Additionally, we had free access to the “S.CAPE” beach and the heated swimming pool downstairs, which was a wonderful bonus, providing a perfect spot for relaxation and water activities.

Our host, Midu, was incredibly helpful and welcoming, ensuring that our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. He also offered us a transfer to the airport with an SUV for a very affordable price, which we accepted.


Overall, I highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a memorable stay in Soma Bay. It truly exceeded our expectations in every way. We cannot wait to come back! and we will not book a hotel this time we will book this amazing apartment😍.

City: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View (Apartment), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View
Positive Review:
This apartment is one of the best in Soma Bay. It is very spacious, modern, clean, well decorated and has amazing panoramic sea views overlooking the best golf courses in the bay. 
The small details like comfortable mattresses and having chargers next to the beds were great. Also, the outdoor swimming pool is heated so can be used anytime of year. Soma bay is a fantastic location with loads to do and explore - we spent most of our time at the pier which has the best snorkeling location in Soma and is only 5 mins away from the apartment. 
I recommend hiring a golf car for your time here so you can get around easily, make the most of the Bay and explore the area as there are many activities for couples and families. 
Highly recommend, would definitely visit again.

City: Beach Albatros Aqua Park - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I recently stayed at Pickalbatros Beach in Hurghada, and it was an absolutely fantastic experience! From the moment we arrived, the staff was incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring a smooth check-in process.

The resort itself is stunning, with beautifully maintained gardens, pristine pools, and direct access to a breathtaking private beach with crystal-clear waters. The rooms were spacious, spotless, and well-equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.

One of the highlights was the food—the variety and quality were outstanding! The buffet offered delicious options for every meal, and the restaurants provided an amazing dining experience. The animation team did a fantastic job keeping guests entertained with fun activities and live shows in the evenings.

Whether you’re looking to relax by the pool, enjoy water sports, or indulge in great food, this hotel has it all. I highly recommend Pickalbatros Beach for an unforgettable holiday in Hurghada! I’ll definitely be returning!

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
We arrived for a 3 -night-stay at New Year just before UK celebration time and we had to wait at the reception for a long time to be accommodated. However, eventually problem resolved, we received an apartment complimentary, even though we missed the Happy New Year mood after a long flight. After this false start everything went smoothly.
Clean room at a noisy street as the hotel is on the main street, on the other hand, it offers at a walking distance and nice restaurants and shops are easy to visit.
The roof restaurant is quite cosy and the staff would offer you variety of food for breakfast , feel free to ask what you prefer.
The beach is 5 minutes walk is nearby and is one of the best in the town and free for the hotel guests. We enjoyed a fresh juice there and we would visit again.
Altogether, next time for a short convenient stay before starting our snorkeling trip, we would visit Lamera again.
Negative Review: Maybe a kettle and tea and coffee amenities in the room to be provided

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals

Positive Review: Very good value for money, the room was cheap, spacious and clean and staff was nice. The hotel is close to the Marina and in one of the touristy areas.
Negative Review: Breakfast was very simply, yet very, very slow. One morning I walked out after a long wait to get my small breakfast.

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I arrived at the hotel, the staff greeted me as if I was meeting friends I hadn't seen for a while. Eman and Fayrouz explained everything about the hotel. I felt respected as a guest and knew I could mention any potential problem which would be solved swiftly. Over the 2 weeks I was there I met the manager Walid and the owner, Mr Mina. The hotel and its guests are in good hands, welcomed and offered great deals with excursions (fabulous at good price), access to beaches, info about well priced restaurants in the area and so on. Ask and you will be heard! I want to thank Gamel also for his help and the night staff who is amazing.
My room was comfortable, good mattress, little balcony, good mirror. 
The breakfast is served from 7am to 12 on the top floor, where you can sit on individual balconies, overlooking the skyline of downtown and the radiant sky. The serving is simple and healthy; they manage to add a change daily, there is a hot item included every day, never the same. The friendliness of the service is the best, even if do not speak Arabic.
I was impressed by the collegial teamwork amongst every worker at Lamera, nothing is too difficult to solve for them. Thank you all for great management and respect for who comes through the door!
Negative Review: The bathroom could do with 2 more hooks

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals

Negative Review: Potentially noisy rooms, breakfast not worth the money (slow, not very tasty)

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
The location is best
You must accept typical street noises which is pleasant to some degree
Inefficient AC, please come in the wintertime
There is only very small table
Doors let many noises, it is best when you book outside hot season as you will live far away from elevator

As a summary: good when it is 25C, when there are few tourists, for budget and frequent touring through marina. For travellers as main base for exploration,
Negative Review:
The rooms were NOT cleaned daily by default as in other budget hotels
The breakfast is not for european taste in geneal, what is worse the service is very slow - not worth it
Certain equipment is missing: safe bolted to the back of bookshelf instead of wall etc
No shelf for soap in the shower, and the curtain too short means lots of water sprinkles around
The table is very small, not for reading, not for laptop, not for 2 people
ELEVATOR IS DANGEROUS always check if it is BEHIND the door when you open it!

Compared to PalmInn: cleaning frequency was worse, sound proofing worse, table worse, bathroom equipment vey slightly worse, safety much worse (elevator). I advise Lamera for adults, PalmInn for families

Room Type: Superior Pool or Side Sea View
Positive Review: We were surprised with a free room upgrade!! So thank you guys!! The resort has a lot of amenities, the views are great! and the food is limitless. Although you can get sick like I did. And the doctor on site will try to rip you off. I only had a sore stomach from food poisoning probably and he wanted me to pay 370 GBP for medicine with the excuse that my insurance could cover it. Thankfully I was leaving the next day so I just bough some medicine at the pharmacy myself later. So be careful. Also the taxi drivers from the front door will try to ask you for 25 euro fee to the airport or bus station. When Uber only charges 4-5 euro. Sure the uber driver might ask you for more. Like they always do in Egypt, but you can negotiate that or don’t necessarily have to do it if you don’t want to. Overall the hotel is good value, and the staff from the resort itself are very good 👍🏻
Negative Review: The gym is pretty broken, it needs maintenance. The clinic is a rip off and so are the shops inside. The food is good, but I was food poisoned on my last day after eating at the Italian restaurant unfortunately. So be careful

City: Casa Cook El Gouna - Adults Only (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Casa Cook El Gouna - Adults Only
Positive Review: We stayed here for 7 nights to escape the Belgian winter and soak up some sun! El Gouna offers plenty of activities (golf, tennis, padel, karting, snorkling) but the large pool at the hotel is so inviting we basically chilled there every day with the occasional kitesurfing and volleybal session - there's a volleybal court and Duotone kite center on site. The staff is super nice, fun and engaging - we knew them by name after two days. There's magazines, chess, checkers and backgammon boards at the pool and a guy handing out shishas. The crowd is quite young, mostly 30/35 year old couples. The food is the best we've had in Egypt. The spa is also great, has its own pool, sauna and steam room. Highly recommend, will be back!
Negative Review: Honestly can't think of many negative points... The Duotone center is expensive they charge 150 euro for one day of rental but it goes down as you book more days. Great service though, they pump your kite, set the lines and help launching. The hotel was built in 2019 so some aspects of the interior might use a little repainting or renovation but don't think most people would notice.

Positive Review: Amazing swimming pools, Spacious room and bathroom. Very nice lounge bar. Very good choice of foods. Staff very friendly. Fun activities for small children. Lots of sunbeds, loungers by the pools.
Negative Review:
Very limited choice of Alcoholic drinks- one red wine, one white wine and one beer (all very average quality) but they did have usual spirits and juices. Our room was in the south west building (room balcony facing North East) so never got any sunlight!
Resort is also very big so feels less cozy (like massive swimming pools with apartment buildings on opposite sides). During our stay maintenance work was going on like painting in our corridors and lobby areas with resultant paint dust!
Evening entertainment average! Bookable “Wow restaurant” not worth it for vegetarians as only one set menu everyday! Overall just felt like a conveyor belt of tourists coming and going.

City: Pickalbatros Blu Spa Resort - Adults Friendly 16 Years Plus- Ultra All-Inclusive (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals

Positive Review: The resort was absolutely incredible. The staff were so incredibly nice and always took care of us and got us anything we needed. The food was delicious and there was an amazing variety in food. We celebrated two birthdays and they helped us celebrate both of them by bringing cake and brought a band to sing for us, it was genuinely so nice. The live shows and activities were also very good and entertainment team made it interactive and fun. We would like to specifically thank Mohammed Atef from the Golden lounge he was genuinely the most helpful and kindest person, he was constantly bringing us food and going above and beyond his main job, thank you so much Mohammed for taking care of us! We would also like to thank Ahmad Rafie for cleaning the rooms, much better than any other hotel we’ve stayed at. Abdul Aziz Mohamed, Ahmed Karam, Ali Eissa, Ahmed Mohamed, and Sayed Ibrahim, all from reception were so helpful they checked us in early, got the rooms we wanted, held all our deliveries at reception and delivered them to our rooms, got us taxis and gave us a lot of insightful information to help us stay safe in Hurghada especially as we were all girls (and helped us avoid any scams), thank you so much to them! In the restaurants Mahmoud Mohamed was very helpful and so were the rest of the staff who constantly brought us drinks and cleared our tables instantly, also Elsayed Nasem who made pizzas was very sweet and the pizzas were incredible! Thank you also to the entertainment team specifically Boda (Abdelrahman), Milana, Tanya and Faris for constantly keeping us entertained!! Finally thank you to Mr Haitham for constantly checking on us even from before the trip, you made us feel very welcome. All the staff were so nice and constantly checking on our safety and happiness and we genuienly wouldn’t have enjoyed the trip without them, thank you so much for an amazing holiday! Would definitely recommend this resort and we will all be coming back in the future :))

I also want to thank Abd El-Rahman, who was always ready to assist with a constant smile. He ensured that my stay was enjoyable and smooth, and his efforts contributed significantly to making my experience better

In summary, Dana Beach Hotel is an excellent choice for comfort and luxury in Hurghada. The staff truly makes this place stand out, and I would like to give special thanks to Mohamed Mahmoud, Abd El-Rahman, and Mohamed El-Hussein for their hospitality and attention.

City: Pickalbatros Aqua Blu Resort - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
As a family of 4, we recently stayed at Pickalbatros Aqua Blue hotel. We booked a family room which contains 2 separate bedrooms and 1 bathroom. 

Our experience has been a very positive one. The hotel is very clean and perfect for anyone looking to visit Hurghada. The location is very close to the airport which was convenient to get to. It is also
close to other amenities such as the shopping mall, beach, marina etc.

The hotel had 3 buffet restaurants and 1 a’la carte restaurant which offered local and international cuisines. We booked the a’la carte restaurant for our daughters birthday and we were received a beautiful surprise from the waiters who sang a birthday song and gave a cake to her.


The swimming pools were heated which allowed us to enjoy and make use of.

Wifi signal and speed was great in anywhere inside the hotel.

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and made our stay very special
and went out of their way to make us happy, particularly staff members 
Hossam in reception, Nader in housekeeping, Mustafa the restaurant manager who was always ready to help us.

All in all, we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to visit Hurghada. 

We will book the hotel again if we plan to holiday in Hurghada Insha Allah.

City: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View (Apartment), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View
Positive Review:
Soma Bay is a stunning coastal resort renowned for its breathtaking natural beauty and luxurious amenities.

We often like to spend our vacations in a hotel in Soma Bay because we love the area. During our recent stay, we decided to extend our trip by one more night, so we booked this apartment as it was much cheaper than staying in the hotel.

I must say, it was an exceptional experience. The apartment was very spacious, immaculately clean, well-maintained, and beautifully furnished with brand new furniture and a well-equipped kitchen, offering all the conveniences one could ask for. It truly felt like a home away from home. We also loved the pool table on the terrace. The location of the apartment was fantastic, with a stunning panoramic view of the sea.

Additionally, we had free access to the “S.CAPE” beach and the heated swimming pool downstairs, which was a wonderful bonus, providing a perfect spot for relaxation and water activities.

Our host, Midu, was incredibly helpful and welcoming, ensuring that our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. He also offered us a transfer to the airport with an SUV for a very affordable price, which we accepted.


Overall, I highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a memorable stay in Soma Bay. It truly exceeded our expectations in every way. We cannot wait to come back! and we will not book a hotel this time we will book this amazing apartment😍.

City: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View (Apartment), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Soma Bay - Luxury 3 Bed Penthouse with Panoramic Sea View
Positive Review:
This apartment is one of the best in Soma Bay. It is very spacious, modern, clean, well decorated and has amazing panoramic sea views overlooking the best golf courses in the bay. 
The small details like comfortable mattresses and having chargers next to the beds were great. Also, the outdoor swimming pool is heated so can be used anytime of year. Soma bay is a fantastic location with loads to do and explore - we spent most of our time at the pier which has the best snorkeling location in Soma and is only 5 mins away from the apartment. 
I recommend hiring a golf car for your time here so you can get around easily, make the most of the Bay and explore the area as there are many activities for couples and families. 
Highly recommend, would definitely visit again.

City: Beach Albatros Aqua Park - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I recently stayed at Pickalbatros Beach in Hurghada, and it was an absolutely fantastic experience! From the moment we arrived, the staff was incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring a smooth check-in process.

The resort itself is stunning, with beautifully maintained gardens, pristine pools, and direct access to a breathtaking private beach with crystal-clear waters. The rooms were spacious, spotless, and well-equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.

One of the highlights was the food—the variety and quality were outstanding! The buffet offered delicious options for every meal, and the restaurants provided an amazing dining experience. The animation team did a fantastic job keeping guests entertained with fun activities and live shows in the evenings.

Whether you’re looking to relax by the pool, enjoy water sports, or indulge in great food, this hotel has it all. I highly recommend Pickalbatros Beach for an unforgettable holiday in Hurghada! I’ll definitely be returning!

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
We arrived for a 3 -night-stay at New Year just before UK celebration time and we had to wait at the reception for a long time to be accommodated. However, eventually problem resolved, we received an apartment complimentary, even though we missed the Happy New Year mood after a long flight. After this false start everything went smoothly.
Clean room at a noisy street as the hotel is on the main street, on the other hand, it offers at a walking distance and nice restaurants and shops are easy to visit.
The roof restaurant is quite cosy and the staff would offer you variety of food for breakfast , feel free to ask what you prefer.
The beach is 5 minutes walk is nearby and is one of the best in the town and free for the hotel guests. We enjoyed a fresh juice there and we would visit again.
Altogether, next time for a short convenient stay before starting our snorkeling trip, we would visit Lamera again.
Negative Review: Maybe a kettle and tea and coffee amenities in the room to be provided

Positive Review: Very good value for money, the room was cheap, spacious and clean and staff was nice. The hotel is close to the Marina and in one of the touristy areas.
Negative Review: Breakfast was very simply, yet very, very slow. One morning I walked out after a long wait to get my small breakfast.

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I arrived at the hotel, the staff greeted me as if I was meeting friends I hadn't seen for a while. Eman and Fayrouz explained everything about the hotel. I felt respected as a guest and knew I could mention any potential problem which would be solved swiftly. Over the 2 weeks I was there I met the manager Walid and the owner, Mr Mina. The hotel and its guests are in good hands, welcomed and offered great deals with excursions (fabulous at good price), access to beaches, info about well priced restaurants in the area and so on. Ask and you will be heard! I want to thank Gamel also for his help and the night staff who is amazing.
My room was comfortable, good mattress, little balcony, good mirror. 
The breakfast is served from 7am to 12 on the top floor, where you can sit on individual balconies, overlooking the skyline of downtown and the radiant sky. The serving is simple and healthy; they manage to add a change daily, there is a hot item included every day, never the same. The friendliness of the service is the best, even if do not speak Arabic.
I was impressed by the collegial teamwork amongst every worker at Lamera, nothing is too difficult to solve for them. Thank you all for great management and respect for who comes through the door!
Negative Review: The bathroom could do with 2 more hooks

City: Lamera Hotel (Hotel), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
The location is best
You must accept typical street noises which is pleasant to some degree
Inefficient AC, please come in the wintertime
There is only very small table
Doors let many noises, it is best when you book outside hot season as you will live far away from elevator

As a summary: good when it is 25C, when there are few tourists, for budget and frequent touring through marina. For travellers as main base for exploration,
Negative Review:
The rooms were NOT cleaned daily by default as in other budget hotels
The breakfast is not for european taste in geneal, what is worse the service is very slow - not worth it
Certain equipment is missing: safe bolted to the back of bookshelf instead of wall etc
No shelf for soap in the shower, and the curtain too short means lots of water sprinkles around
The table is very small, not for reading, not for laptop, not for 2 people
ELEVATOR IS DANGEROUS always check if it is BEHIND the door when you open it!

Compared to PalmInn: cleaning frequency was worse, sound proofing worse, table worse, bathroom equipment vey slightly worse, safety much worse (elevator). I advise Lamera for adults, PalmInn for families

Room Type: Superior Pool or Side Sea View
Positive Review: We were surprised with a free room upgrade!! So thank you guys!! The resort has a lot of amenities, the views are great! and the food is limitless. Although you can get sick like I did. And the doctor on site will try to rip you off. I only had a sore stomach from food poisoning probably and he wanted me to pay 370 GBP for medicine with the excuse that my insurance could cover it. Thankfully I was leaving the next day so I just bough some medicine at the pharmacy myself later. So be careful. Also the taxi drivers from the front door will try to ask you for 25 euro fee to the airport or bus station. When Uber only charges 4-5 euro. Sure the uber driver might ask you for more. Like they always do in Egypt, but you can negotiate that or don’t necessarily have to do it if you don’t want to. Overall the hotel is good value, and the staff from the resort itself are very good 👍🏻
Negative Review: The gym is pretty broken, it needs maintenance. The clinic is a rip off and so are the shops inside. The food is good, but I was food poisoned on my last day after eating at the Italian restaurant unfortunately. So be careful

Negative Review:

Resort is also very big so feels less cozy (like massive swimming pools with apartment buildings on opposite sides). During our stay maintenance work was going on like painting in our corridors and lobby areas with resultant paint dust!
Evening entertainment average! Bookable “Wow restaurant” not worth it for vegetarians as only one set menu everyday! Overall just felt like a conveyor belt of tourists coming and going.

City: Pickalbatros Aqua Vista Resort - Hurghada (Resort) (Egypt) deals
Positive Review:
I recently stayed at the Pickalbatros Aqua Vista Hotel in Hurghada, and it was a fantastic experience. From the moment we arrived, the staff was welcoming and efficient, ensuring a smooth check-in. The resort's grounds are beautifully maintained, and our room was spacious, modern, and impeccably clean with a lovely balcony view. The guy who was cleaning our room Atef Ashry is really professional and our room was cleaned perfectly.

The variety of pools, including fun water slides and relaxing adult-only areas, catered to all our needs. Dining was a delight, with a wide range of delicious options at the buffet and excellent à la carte restaurants. The themed nights added a great variety to our meals.
The waiter, Ibrahim Gamal, was really professional and always on the service whenever we needed him he was there. Exponential service.

The entertainment team kept us engaged with daily activities and evening shows, and the spa offered a blissful retreat. The beach, accessible via a convenient shuttle, was pristine with clear waters.

Overall, the Pickalbatros Aqua Vista Hotel provided exceptional service, luxurious accommodations, and memorable experiences. I highly recommend it for a perfect getaway in Hurghada

My experience at Dana Beach Hotel in Hurghada was absolutely fantastic. The hotel boasts a perfect location by the sea, offering beautiful views and a relaxing atmosphere. The rooms are extremely clean and equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay.

I would like to extend a special thanks to a few individuals who made my stay truly exceptional. First, the front desk manager, Mohamed Mahmoud, who was always helpful and cheerful. His professionalism and friendly demeanor were evident, and he made me feel right at home. He was always available to answer any questions or provide assistance.

I also want to thank Abd El-Rahman, who was always ready to assist with a constant smile. He ensured that my stay was enjoyable and smooth, and his efforts contributed significantly to making my experience better

In summary, Dana Beach Hotel is an excellent choice for comfort and luxury in Hurghada. The staff truly makes this place stand out, and I would like to give special thanks to Mohamed Mahmoud, Abd El-Rahman, and Mohamed El-Hussein for their hospitality and attention.

Positive Review:
As a family of 4, we recently stayed at Pickalbatros Aqua Blue hotel. We booked a family room which contains 2 separate bedrooms and 1 bathroom. 

Our experience has been a very positive one. The hotel is very clean and perfect for anyone looking to visit Hurghada. The location is very close to the airport which was convenient to get to. It is also
close to other amenities such as the shopping mall, beach, marina etc.

The hotel had 3 buffet restaurants and 1 a’la carte restaurant which offered local and international cuisines. We booked the a’la carte restaurant for our daughters birthday and we were received a beautiful surprise from the waiters who sang a birthday song and gave a cake to her.


The swimming pools were heated which allowed us to enjoy and make use of.

Wifi signal and speed was great in anywhere inside the hotel.

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and made our stay very special
and went out of their way to make us happy, particularly staff members 
Hossam in reception, Nader in housekeeping, Mustafa the restaurant manager who was always ready to help us.

All in all, we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to visit Hurghada. 

We will book the hotel again if we plan to holiday in Hurghada Insha Allah.

Positive Review:
I recently stayed at Pickalbatros Beach in Hurghada, and it was an absolutely fantastic experience! From the moment we arrived, the staff was incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring a smooth check-in process.

The resort itself is stunning, with beautifully maintained gardens, pristine pools, and direct access to a breathtaking private beach with crystal-clear waters. The rooms were spacious, spotless, and well-equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.

One of the highlights was the food—the variety and quality were outstanding! The buffet offered delicious options for every meal, and the restaurants provided an amazing dining experience. The animation team did a fantastic job keeping guests entertained with fun activities and live shows in the evenings.

Whether you’re looking to relax by the pool, enjoy water sports, or indulge in great food, this hotel has it all. I highly recommend Pickalbatros Beach for an unforgettable holiday in Hurghada! I’ll definitely be returning!

City: Serenity Alpha Beach - Ex Serenity Makadi Beach (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Serenity Alpha Beach - Ex Serenity Makadi Beach
Positive Review:
After travelling 7 days from Cairo, Aswan, Luxor, it was great to arrive at the resort and receive a upgrade room to the executive suite. The room was massive, great view, big bed, good shower and bath. 
Resort was very clean, staff very friendly, great variety of food on the buffet, nice and quiet la cart restaurants, there is a bar and a restaurant by the beach. 
Big thanks to Mohamed Ghran and Marian always helpful with our enquires.
Negative Review: Some activities could be better communicated as it was not always clear what was happening. Spa should have a list with prices for the massage instead of someone selling the packs around the pool or beach.

City: Serenity Alpha Beach - Ex Serenity Makadi Beach (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Hotel Name: Serenity Alpha Beach - Ex Serenity Makadi Beach
Positive Review: Staff went above and beyond to make sure we had a good stay. Got upgraded to a very spacious room and the cleanliness was outstanding. Food was delicious with many choices, and we especially appreciated all the vegetarian options. Plenty of activities and shopping were available right on the property or the next door Alma hotel.
Negative Review: Noise from the main outside bar area while entertainment was going on was quite loud in our room. The spa treatments were wonderful but the changing room could be cleaner and have more amenities like shower essentials and a hairdryer. It was annoying to be bothered poolside by people trying to sell the activites. It's important to remeber to ask for a do not disturb pouch when getting towels so you can lounge in peace.

To Nicola Windley, Mahmoud Hefnawy + Team

City: Pyramisa Beach Resort Sahl Hasheesh (Resort), Hurghada (Egypt) deals
Room Type: Superior Pool or Side Sea View
Positive Review: We were surprised with a free room upgrade!! So thank you guys!! The resort has a lot of amenities, the views are great! and the food is limitless. Although you can get sick like I did. And the doctor on site will try to rip you off. I only had a sore stomach from food poisoning probably and he wanted me to pay 370 GBP for medicine with the excuse that my insurance could cover it. Thankfully I was leaving the next day so I just bough some medicine at the pharmacy myself later. So be careful. Also the taxi drivers from the front door will try to ask you for 25 euro fee to the airport or bus station. When Uber only charges 4-5 euro. Sure the uber driver might ask you for more. Like they always do in Egypt, but you can negotiate that or don’t necessarily have to do it if you don’t want to. Overall the hotel is good value, and the staff from the resort itself are very good 👍🏻
Negative Review: The gym is pretty broken, it needs maintenance. The clinic is a rip off and so are the shops inside. The food is good, but I was food poisoned on my last day after eating at the Italian restaurant unfortunately. So be careful
